title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram - Panchala Style
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish finish.
features: Elaborate floral and paisley (manga malai) design with intricate diamond pav√© setting. Features graduated Emeralds and delicate pearl drops. The pendant is detachable for versatile styling. Exemplifies traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern finesse.
occasions: and other grand celebrations like Seemantham or half-saree functions. Also suitable for high-end parties and events requiring a statement piece.
description: A timeless heirloom piece crafted with exceptional attention to detail. The brilliant diamonds sparkle intensely, while the emeralds add a touch of regal elegance. The detachable pendant offers styling versatility. This Haaram is a symbol of prosperity and tradition, perfect for marking life's most precious moments. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional quality and durability.
